RT @aisghair: Twas the night before repeal & all through the house Not a craytur was stirring Not even a mouse Jumpers were hung in the hot…

#RepealThe8th #TogetherForYes #IVotedYes
I voted against the 8th amendment. Now I vote for the 36th amendment, to repeal it. May it come to pass. Let's hope we've changed history today. Now we wait.
